mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHINSEI ( KIGYO_CD, SHINSEI_NO, SHINSEI_RIYU, TOKU_SHINSEI_RIYU, SHINSEI_KBN, SHAIN_UID, SHINSEI_YMD, SHAIN_NO, SHINCHOKU_KBN, GEN_TSUKINRO_END_KBN, ADDRESS_CHG_KBN, KINMU_ADDRESS_CHG_KBN, KYUSHOKU_HUKKI_KBN ) VALUES ( #{kigyoCd}, #{shinseiNo}, #{shinseiRiyu}, #{tokuShinseiRiyu}, #{shinseiKbn}, #{shainUid}, #{shinseiYmd}, #{shainNo}, #{shinchokuKbn}, #{genTsukinroEndKbn}, #{addressChgKbn}, #{kinmuAddressChgKbn}, #{kyushokuHukkiKbn} )
